text:
There is a wrong translation in the German Error 403 .var.html file. It reads 
"Authentisierung fehlgeschlagen!", however it should be "Authentifizierung 
fehlgeschlagen!"
creator: floeff@arcor.de
nd@perlig.de
text:
You're wrong.

Actually we've asked the Duden editors about "Authentisierung" and
"Authentifizierung". Both words co-exist with different meanings.
"Authentisierung - sich authentisieren", means, one gives one's own credentials.
"Authentifizierung - jmd. o. etw. authentifizieren" means, one checks
credentials given by someone.

I'm marking the report as invalid so far.
Thanks for your care, anyway :)

creator: floeff@arcor.de
text:
Wow! ;-) No one can say that you don't learn by using Open Source :)))
Didn't know that one. Thanks for making it clear!
